abstract.p: An optical report generation system includes a clinical information system ("CIS") server to store raw monitoring data for at least one patient and to generate optical reports, at a predetermined time interval, based on the raw monitoring data. The CIS server includes a database. A control server determines the reports to generate, based on the raw monitoring data. The optical reports include all possible optical reports which can be generated based on the raw monitoring data.

An optical report generation system includes a clinical information systems (~CIS~) server (105) to store raw monitoring data for at least one patient and to generate optical reports, at a predetermined time interval, based on the raw monitoring data. The CIS server (105) includes a database (107). A control server (100) determines the reports to generate, based on the raw monitoring data. The optical reports include all possible optical reports which can be generated based on the raw monitoring data.

An optical report generation system includes a clinical information systems ("CIS") server to store raw monitoring data for at least one patient and to generate optical reports, at a predetermined time interval, based on the raw monitoring data. The CIS server includes a database. A control server determines the reports to generate, based on the raw monitoring data. The optical reports include all possible optical reports which can be generated based on the raw monitoring data.

L'invention concerne un système d'établissement de rapport optique qui comprend un serveur de système d'information clinique, permettant d'enregistrer des données de contrôle brutes pour au moins un patient et d'établir des rapports optiques, selon un intervalle de temps prédéterminé, à partir des données de contrôle brutes. Le serveur en question comporte une base de données. Un serveur de commande détermine les rapports à établir, à partir des données de contrôle brutes. Les rapports optiques considérés s'entendent de tous les rapports optiques susceptibles d'être établis à partir des données de contrôle brutes.

The CIS server (105) includes a database (107). A control server (100) determines the reports to generate, based on the raw monitoring data. The optical reports include all possible optical reports which can be generated based on the raw monitoring data.
